Step 3: Perform a per-pair t-test (Treatment vs Control) with multiple-testing correction

Source: R/get_ChimeStatistics.R
get_ChimeStatistics.Rd

Step 3: Perform a per-pair t-test (Treatment vs Control) with multiple-testing correction

Usage

get_ChimeStatistics(lr_scores, adjust_method = "fdr", by_direction = TRUE)

Arguments

lr_scores

A data frame from get_ChimeLRscore(), containing at least:

  • pair: Ligand–receptor pair identifier.

  • score: Numeric score for each sample.

  • condition: Condition label ("Control" or "Treatment").

  • direction (optional): Interaction direction, if applicable.

adjust_method

Method for p.adjust (default "fdr").

by_direction

If TRUE and lr_scores contains direction, adjust p-values separately within each direction.

Value

A tibble with one row per pair (and per direction if present), including:

  • direction: Interaction direction (if present).

  • pair: Ligand–receptor pair identifier.

  • p.value: Raw p-value from the t-test.

  • t: t-statistic from the t-test.

  • mean_Treatment: Mean score in Treatment samples.

  • mean_Control: Mean score in Control samples.

  • delta: Difference mean_Treatment - mean_Control.

  • n_Treatment: Number of Treatment samples.

  • n_Control: Number of Control samples.

  • p.adj: Adjusted p-value after multiple-testing correction.
